section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 9. Chapter 9: Diseases of the Circulatory System > a. Hypertension > 6) Hypertension, Secondary

content.full_text: Secondary hypertension is due to an underlying condition. Two codes are required: one to identify the underlying etiology and one from category I15 to identify the hypertension. Sequencing of codes is determined by the reason for admission/encounter. (Evidence: pg no: 51, L82-L84)
content.summary: Guidelines for coding secondary hypertension requiring two codes - one for underlying etiology and one from I15 category, with sequencing based on admission/encounter reason (Evidence: pg no: 51, L82-L84)
